document.full_text: a bicycle bomb wounded seven people including a police officer in istanbul thursday, in an attack that prime minister tayyip erdogan said bore the mark of the main kurdish militant organization.
document.title: bike bomb wounds 7 in istanbul, kurd group suspected
lines_and_colors: a bicycle bomb wounded seven people including a police officer in istanbul thursday, in an attack that prime minister tayyip erdogan said bore the mark of the main kurdish militant organization.
